Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. (Sales Tax Renewal) -- 1/4% S&U Tax - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Pointe Coupee, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974 and Section 338.54 of Title 47 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended, and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one-fourth of one percent (1/4%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption and storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and on the sales of services in the Parish, all as defined by law, (an estimated $850,665 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of 10 years, from July 1, 2017, the proceeds of the Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated to and used solely for capital improvements, maintenance and operation of the Pointe Coupee Parish Health Services District Number One?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW HRC Plan of Government -- Adopt HRC - PJ
Race.FullText: Shall the Home Rule Charter Plan of Government for Pointe Coupee Parish prepared and submitted by the duly constituted Home Rule Charter Commission according to Article VI, Section 5 of the Constitution of Louisiana, and other applicable law, be adopted?
